All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AiInteface
    Interface for the different ai
    AiInterface
    Class that act as a interface between ai and the game/input generates and stores all information the ai will need
    Bishop
    Class Bishop representing the chess piece bishop
    Board
    Class Board representing the chess board
    BoardState
    Class that represents/saves the state of the board to a certain point in time
    BoardValueNode
    Class that serves as a tree structure, where every object of this class is representing the Board after a move and acting as a node in the tree
    CemeteryController
    Class to control the cemetery output on gui
    Check
    Class Check contains methods and information to search for and keep control of check- and checkmate situations
    ChessBoardComputer
    Class extending the ChessBoardController containing concrete implementations for vsAi game mode
    ChessBoardController
    Abstract class that contains functions to handle the gui chessboard representation
    ChessBoardHuman
    Class extending the ChessBoardController to implement concrete functions for the PvP game mode
    ClockController
    This class is the controller class for the chess-clock
    Constants  
    GameScreen
    Controller for gameScreen.fxml
    GuiMain
    Starts the JavaFX GUI and handles transitions between scenes as well as events that cant be implemented in the controller classes
    HumanVsComputer
    Handles the interaction between the human and the computer in Human vs Ai game
    Input
    Class Input that controls the Input and updates the board
    King
    Class King representing the chess piece king
    Knight
    Class Knight representing the chess piece knight
    LastMoveController
    Class to control the list of moves on the gui
    Main
    main Class with main-method
    MinMaxAi
    AI that generates its next move by using the min max algorithm
    Move
    Class that represents a possible move
    Pawn
    Class Pawn representing the chess piece peasant
    Piece
    abstract class representing a chess piece
    PieceState
    Class that represents/saves the state of piece at certain point
    Player  
    PlayerInput
    Class that handles all the input by the player
    Positioning
    Class that can read and write the Positions of Pieces on a Board
    Queen
    Class Queen representing the chess piece queen
    Rook
    Class Rook representing the chess piece rook
    SimpleAi
    a simple ai that just randomly picks a possible move as the next move
    Square
    Class Square representing a chess square on the chess board
    StartMenu
    Controller for startMenu.fxml
